title: The Parlee Taos Gravel Bike Has Gone Missing (Update: It’s Found!) – Eurobike 2024
content:
The Massachusetts-based bicycle manufacturer was all set to launch a new gravel bike here in Frankfurt, Germany. The bike never made it to Eurobike.

Read the full article at The Parlee Taos Gravel Bike Has Gone Missing (Update: It’s Found!) – Eurobike 2024 on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
